#summary The Delete API
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

=Deleting Images=

The Imgur Delete API allows you to delete your uploaded images.

==Details==

  * *URL*: http://imgur.com/api/delete/DELETE_HASH
  * *Method*: GET (HTTP)

==Return Formats==

  * *XML*: http://imgur.com/api/delete/DELETE_HASH.xml (default)
  * *JSON*: http://imgur.com/api/delete/DELETE_HASH.json

_Obviously, replace DELETE_HASH with the actual delete hash._

==Parameters==

_None._

==Examples==

*cURL*: 

_Delete an Image_
{{{
curl "http://imgur.com/api/delete/Sflef43ALZ.xml"
}}}

_Delete an Image_
{{{
curl "http://imgur.com/api/delete/Sflef43ALZ.json"
}}}

==Sample Output==

*XML*
{{{
<rsp stat="ok">
	<message>Success</message>
</rsp>
}}}

*JSON*
{{{
{
	"rsp": {
		"stat": "ok",
		"message": "Success"
	}
}
}}}

==Possible Errors==

|| *Code* || *Message* ||
|| 4000 || No image selected ||
|| 4001 || Invalid delete hash ||
|| 4002 || Image could not be deleted ||
|| 9000 || Invalid API request ||
|| 9001 || Invalid response format ||
